N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1627-2.2 - Responsibilities of local housing authority

State Regulations

It is responsibility of local housing authority
to: (a) determine, prior to admission, aggregate annual income of all members of applicant's household; (b) restrict admission to such persons or
families whose aggregate annual income is within applicable admission limits
prescribed by law; (c) review at
least once a year, aggregate annual income of persons or families in
possession; (d) assess and collect
surcharges in accordance with approved schedules from persons and families
whose income warrants such surcharges; (e) require persons or families to remove in
accordance with section
156
of

Public Housing Law when their incomes exceed legal or administrative
limits. Notes
